description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Torrent of the French Revolutions; or, a Guide to the reading of the history of France from 1789 to 1873. With chronological and genealogical maps of the different dynasties. Illustrations, etc" Author: NEREVY, J. F. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9225.c.10."
